basic.description: Temperature, equations of state, internal energy, first and second laws, entropy and response functions. Application to heat engines and refrigerators. Free energies, Legendre transformations, changes of phase. Introduction to the Boltzmann factor and statistical mechanics.
basic.subject: PHYS
basic.title: Thermodynamics

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    PHYS242.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from PHYS274; PHYS372.
